title: AI in Healthcare: Advancements Under Scrutiny
description: The integration of artificial intelligence into medical devices is transforming healthcare but raises concerns due to increased reports of malfunctions and injuries. As AI-enhanced devices like the TruDi Navigation System come under scrutiny, lawsuits and safety debates highlight the challenges regulators face in keeping pace with technological advancements.
content: The adoption of artificial intelligence in healthcare is marked by both promise and peril, as illustrated by the integration of AI into the TruDi Navigation System, a device used to treat chronic sinusitis. Developed initially by Acclarent and acquir... [888 chars]

title: The Double-Edged Sword of AI in Healthcare: Promise and Pitfalls
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly influencing healthcare, with many patients using AI for medical advice. However, cases where AI provides inaccurate or misleading medical information highlight significant concerns. Incidents, such as an AI misdiagnosing cancer in Turkey and inaccurate results from medical apps, underscore the need for regulatory oversight and caution.
content: Artificial intelligence is transforming industries across the globe, including healthcare, where patients like Dr. Cem Aksoy's 18-year-old patient are turning to AI for advice. However, this reliance on AI can have serious implications, as seen in a ... [682 chars]

title: UAE central bank marks MBZUAI’s five-year milestone with commemorative gold and silver coins
description: Middle East News: The Central Bank of the UAE has unveiled limited-edition gold and silver coins celebrating the fifth anniversary of Mohamed bin Zayed University of Artificial Intelligence, reflecting the country's commitment to boosting its AI education sector.
content:
CBUAE issued gold and silver coins marking MBZUAI’s fifth anniversary, honouring AI education achievements nationwide/Image: X

title: US software stocks tumble sparks concerns that AI trade is reshaping markets
description: NEW YORK, Feb 9 (Reuters) - ‌The software and services industry's recent plunge has ignited fears that the artificial intelligence boom may be reshaping markets in unexpected ways, raising questions about whether ‌a rotation out of technology stocks signals trouble ahead for the AI trade.

title: America's oldest bank spends billions on tech
description: The race to integrate artificial intelligence is on among the banks. BNY now has 134 "digital employees," who work alongside humans.
content:
At America's oldest bank, 134 new workers don't sleep or take sick days. They don't even have names.
They're what BNY calls "digital employees." They work side by side with humans. They have unique roles and are evaluated by how well they do them. So... [3061 chars]

title: Pierre Huyghe’s A.I. Art Monster Takes Over a Night Club in Berlin
description: Zachary Fine reviews the artist’s newest installation, which is housed in a night club in Berlin and features a monster whose motions were generated by artificial intelligence.
content: My preparation for “Liminals,” an art work by Pierre Huyghe showing in Berlin, at Halle am Berghain, involved a small suitcase of books and articles about quantum physics, the science of sound, post-1968 France, relational aesthetics, and the sociolo... [7059 chars]
